divs: sighting detailswe were living right in the front of a river that is separating the us and canada...more accurately clair and fort kent accross the river... i was about 10 y\o. we were baby sit by my aunt that was about 30 y\o ant the time, i had a younger brother 1 year younger and one y\o older sister ... i seen a weard fasinating light reflecting... and counld figuer out what it was ...first i tought it was a bicycle but the way it was going back and forth and closer and farther it was impossible...we told my aunt to come and take a look at it ...for about 30 sec. to a min. looking at it we just seen her on the top of the refrigerator ...dont know how she got there and seen to be so tromatise ... i will always remember ....we were 4 that seen that insident...i seen the series tonight in the discovery chanel that is starting talking about so many witnesses seen the same!!! recently ...we have to talk people... i decided to talk about what we seen, we never talk about it because you know...people think we are crasy...but we are not ...
Summary: it look like a bicycle reflector in the air but fast back and forth direction
trends: There have been no other sightings in Clair
This sighting has never been favorited.
